name: Dr. Ayaan Rahman
description: Dr. Rahman provides comprehensive cardiac care including preventive heart checkups, ECG, and cholesterol management.

name: Dr. Nisha Verma
description: Specializes in treating skin conditions such as acne, eczema, and cosmetic dermatology procedures.

name: Dr. Samuel D’Costa
description: Expert in diagnosing and managing neurological disorders including epilepsy and Parkinson’s disease.

name: Dr. Fatima Noor
description: Dedicated to child healthcare with focus on immunizations, growth tracking, and developmental milestones.

name: Dr. Rajeev Kapoor
description: Specializes in joint replacement, sports injuries, and bone health with a modern surgical approach.

name: Dr. Aisha Siddiqui
description: Offers care in pregnancy, fertility consultations, menstrual issues, and overall women’s wellness.

name: Dr. Imran Malik
description: Provides diagnosis and treatment for respiratory conditions like asthma, bronchitis, and COPD.

name: Dr. Rina Das
description: Experienced in treating ear infections, hearing loss, sinus issues, and voice disorders.

name: Dr. Varun Shetty
description: Deals with urinary tract disorders, kidney stones, and male reproductive health.

name: Dr. Meher Qureshi
description: Expert in treating digestive disorders, liver conditions, and conducting endoscopy procedures.
